channel.title: The Ark
channel.description: The Ark is the weekly newspaper of Tiburon, Belvedere and Strawberry

item.title: Tiburon bike lanes pushed to 2029 as Caltrans proceeds along rest of corridor
item.description: The Phase 1 start date hinges on Tiburon first completing a separate project to install underground conduit for fiber-optic cables along the boulevard.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Tiburon updates building code with flexibility for small homes
item.description: Tiburon residents looking to build tiny homes will soon face fewer regulatory hurdles under building-code updates approved Nov. 19.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez

item.title: Everyday Encounters: A musician leaves tech to help others build connections
item.description: Kedar Shashidhar worked in social media, virtual reality and artificial intelligence but recently left tech to become a life coach.
item.dc:creator: Francisco Martinez
